title: Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for Visa Services and Betar, Canary Mission

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Any communication sent to or from the Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for Visa Services which contain any of the following non-case sensitive search terms, where the use of an asterisk (*) represents a wildcard (e.g., a search for "*wiki*" would return an email with the word "https://www.wikipedia.org"):
*canary*
"Canary Mission"
"Betar"
https://x.com/Betar_USA/*
https://www.x.com/Betar_USA/*

2. Any communication between the Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for Visa Services and any email address on the following domains: betarus.org, canarymission.org.

"Communications" means and includes emails, text messages, social media messages, letters, memoranda, calendar entries, chats, instant messages, or any other form of one-to-one or one-to-many communication. "Communications" also includes transcripts, videos, audio, minutes, notes, or other recordings of conversations, meetings, phone calls, or Zoom (or similar) meetings.

Please note that this request seeks public records wherever they may be found, including on devices or networks owned or operated by private parties. For example, if an employee uses a personal cell phone or social media account to conduct public business, records created, maintained, or held on the phone or account are public records subject to this request.

This request is limited to communications sent or received on or after January 20, 2025.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh
